org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary

Class MapillaryLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.AbstractMapViewPaintable
      • org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.Layer
        • org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.AbstractModifiableLayer
          • org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.MapillaryLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openstreetmap.josm.data.osm.event.DataSetListener, org.openstreetmap.josm.data.projection.ProjectionChangeListener, org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.MainLayerManager.ActiveLayerChangeListener, org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.MapViewPaintable, org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.SaveToFile, org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.UploadToServer, org.openstreetmap.josm.tools.Destroyable

    public final class MapillaryLayer
extends org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.AbstractModifiableLayer
implements org.openstreetmap.josm.data.osm.event.DataSetListener, org.openstreetmap.josm.gui.layer.MainLayerManager.ActiveLayerChangeListener
    This class represents the layer shown in JOSM. There can only exist one instance of this object.
